name: Platform Game Template
description:
This is the template game that students will use in the Content & Level Design module for 21/22.

Teams will be assigned and given semi-random creative directions. They must then select a subset of the features on display here and use them to produce levels for their game.

Students can make variants of feature instances by altering variables attached to the features, but must treat functionality as "locked" for the project! All variants must be documented thoroughly in the team's Design Site.
